backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining a Product type and a mutable list with endpoints to initialize hardcoded demo products and query them by category, brand, or combined filters with optional sorting.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented feature IDs (hero redesign, blob replacement, headline, nav bar, circular badge, etc.) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary providing one-sentence descriptions of each frontend source file, serving as a human-readable index of the frontend codebase's structure and purpose.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the FitVerse AI app that mounts the React root div and loads the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with two layouts: a bare LandingLayout for the landing page and an AppLayout with AnimatedBackground and Sidebar for all inner pages.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Canvas-based fixed background component that renders a near-black fill with three slowly drifting radial gradient orbs in muted purple/pink tones using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/components/CircularTextBadg: SVG component that arranges the string 'AI-POWERED FASHION · PERFECT FIT EVERY TIME ·' as individual characters around a circle and continuously rotates them via requestAnimationFrame, with a sparkle icon centered inside.
frontend/src/components/ContinuousRotati: Renders an animated 3D blob using React Three Fiber with an IcosahedronGeometry that continuously deforms via a noise function and rotates, lit by multiple colored point lights with iridescent physical material.
frontend/src/components/DynamicBackgroun: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: A reusable glassmorphism card component that accepts optional glow color variants (purple, blue, pink) and an onClick handler, applying corresponding border and shadow styles.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product with its image, category badge, fit confidence score, size selector, and an add-to-trial button that triggers size mismatch or wardrobe warnings before adding to the trial cart.
frontend/src/components/ScrollDriven3DSc: A scroll-driven Three.js scene featuring a deforming blob whose amplitude, scale, and color interpolate based on scroll progress, plus two ambient floating orbs.
frontend/src/components/Sidebar.tsx: A collapsible fixed sidebar with icon-based navigation links that expands on hover to show labels, highlighting the active route with a gradient indicator.
frontend/src/components/SizeWarningDialo: A modal dialog that warns the user when their selected size differs from the body-scan-recommended size, offering Cancel or Add Anyway actions.
frontend/src/components/SpiralTextTransi: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/components/TrialCart.tsx: A sidebar trial cart component showing up to 5 selected items with a progress bar, individual remove buttons, and a button to navigate to the Trial Hub page.
frontend/src/components/WardrobeWarningD: A modal dialog component that displays an AI wardrobe insight/warning message with Cancel and 'Add Anyway' action buttons, styled with a dark glassmorphism aesthetic.
frontend/src/components/Web3Blob.tsx: A Three.js-based animated 3D blob mesh component that morphs between two noise-driven shapes and responds to scroll progress with spiral rotation and upward movement.
frontend/src/contexts/AppContext.tsx: Defines and provides global app state via React Context, managing trial cart items (max 5), body scan data, and wardrobe data with typed interfaces and helper functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) usage, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication provider and hook using DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all products, initializing products, and fetching filtered products from the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: A custom hook that tracks and returns a normalized 0–1 scroll progress value, either for the whole window or relative to a specific element, using requestAnimationFrame for performance.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that defines CSS custom properties for theming, Tailwind imports, typography with Inter and Syne fonts, and utility classes for nav, hero headline, blob buttons, and other UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/pages/BodyScan.tsx: A page that simulates an AI body scan with an animated progress bar, revealing mock body measurements (shoulder, chest, waist, height) upon completion and storing them in app context.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: The landing/home page featuring a full-screen purple hero with a 3D rotating blob, FitVerseAI branding, top navigation links, and a circular text badge.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: A product shop page that fetches backend products, supplements them with mock data, supports category filtering, and handles adding items to a trial cart with size and wardrobe conflict warnings.
frontend/src/pages/TrialHub.tsx: A trial review page where users can mark each trial cart item as kept or returned, displaying live counts of pending, purchased, and returned items.
frontend/src/pages/Wardrobe.tsx: A wardrobe analysis page that simulates scanning a user's wardrobe, then displays category stats and a color distribution bar chart using mock data stored in app context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom fonts (Inter, Syne), CSS-variable-based color tokens, blob accent colors, border radius variables, and accordion animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the FitVerse AI project state (version 3), listing 5 existing UI features focused on redesigning the landing page hero section with a purple background, iridescent 3D blob, hero text, nav bar, and rotating badge element.
